website_summaries.verdict: Ideal pairing of a mat-sized towel and hand towel to wipe sweat, plus a handy spray bottle.
pros: One of the few products on the market that include a hand towel and spray bottle in addition to a large microfiber towel
Owners love that by spraying water onto towel before the start of practice, you won't slip even if you haven't started sweating yet
Corner pockets so you can tuck mat into towel
Doesn't feel damp when you lay down during corpse pose
cons: Some note that the towel is too big for standard size yoga mats, so you'll need to do a lot of tucking

customer_reviews.title: A FANTASTIC PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: So i just got the towels today (along with the mini spray bottle) and immediately took a hot power vinyasa class. Must say that this towel ROCKS!! Works wonders!! I have a PRO Manduka mat which is one of the best in the market yet I still find it somewhat slippery since I sweat a lot ... this has been bothering me for a while now. But I can finally say my frustration is gone. Highly recommended:) - good price too! Especially because the yogitoe are like $65. You also get a hand towel!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my practice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my practice. I do not take hot yoga but rather attend a more traditional studio with both Pilates and vinyasa flow yoga. However, I still get warm and the hands slip in downward dog, pike or other forward bends. This towel has completely stopped that and given me the confidence to try more aggressive poses. It's nice to get both sizes, too. For Pilates, I only have to use the hand towel and it stops the slide. The large is best for a full yoga class. It washes well and maintains the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conway

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent. Don’t worry about slipping!
customer_reviews.text: You don’t even need to spray it too much to prevent your feet from slipping! This is a must-have for hot yoga. The material is not too rough and not too soft/comfy as well, so it is perfect for a workout. Sometimes it clumps up, but the corner holders are very helpful. I see people constantly readjusting their towels during my class and with this one, I never had to. It is slightly longer than my mat but it easily folds under and provides a little extra towel if you are extremely sweaty!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference!
customer_reviews.text: I'm relatively new to hot yoga and this set makes all the difference in managing that wonderful detoxing sweat: the mat towel stays put through the whole class and the hand towel (same material) is convenient for wiping off during and after. I haven't noticed the need to spray the mat towel before class but the spray bottle is a nice little extra. I'll be ordering another set to have handy when the other set is in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery
customer_reviews.text: It’s adsorbent but my hands and feet slide A LOT during downward dog and warrior poses. Pretty disappointed and will probably use it just as a post work out towel. Update: Don't buy this towel. It bunches up at my hands and feet and my hands and feet slide all over the place. I kept trying to use it as intended and it just does not work. I don't use softener, and I wet the towel down just like they say to but it still is a horrible yoga towel. :(
customer_reviews.author: Elin Gunnarsson

customer_reviews.title: COLOR BLEEDS EVEN IN COLD WASH
customer_reviews.text: Pros: thick weighty towel, inexpensive price for 2 towels, large size Cons: doesn't grip yoga mat well, color bleeds in the wash and WILL get onto your light-colored fabrics/clothes (!! beware !!) Would not recommend. Maybe if you're looking for a beach towel this may work but would definitely not recommend for hot yoga which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: maple

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bikram and Great Company too!
customer_reviews.text: I do Bikram Yoga and wanted a longer non-slip towel. This set fit the bill, and I like the corner catches that hold it tight on my yoga mat. However, the 5-Stars also comes from the great service with integrity. After a couple washes, one of the towel corners started to unseamed (very small as you can see). I emailed, the company took full ownership, and promptly sent me a new set. As a fellow business owner, I can tell you there will always be a small percentage of product defects (esp with small business). And I appreciate and recommend companies that operate with integrity and make any such defects right. Thank you Cherry!
customer_reviews.author: Steven T

customer_reviews.title: BEST hot yoga towel ever!
customer_reviews.text: I practice hot yoga every day, so you can imagine how gross my towels get! I bought this towel and will not be trying any other brands. It has great grip--I have not slipped once, and I sweat a lot! I can use this towel 4 days straight without washing it in-between classes. All I have to do is hang it to dry (which takes only an hour or so) and then pack it up in my bag! There is no smell from all my sweat on the towels, and I SWEAT A LOT. Highly recommend for hot yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Olson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BUY & VALUE -- First-timers and experienced should buy this mat towel!
customer_reviews.text: This works great in hot yoga to avoid turning your mat into a slip-n-slide. The fabric doesn't have a high pile and has pockets for the edges of the mat, so it doesn't bunch up. The additional mini-towel is perfect for sweating and the misting bottle is great to carry mat cleaning solution, essential oil spray for your body afterward, or water/essential oil water for wetting your towel to up friction! They set you up for success in one bundle -- great buy, great value for the price, and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Great towels at great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these towels. Fold small to fit in my yoga mat bag. Protects my mat when I do hot yoga and sweat everywhere. Soft texture but can still grio with my hands and feet. Great corners tuck in your mat to hold it in place. Face towel is a great bonus! I have a Lululemon one I paid 3 times the amount for but this is just as good, besides lack of pattern.
customer_reviews.author: The1katya

customer_reviews.title: The IUGA towel's corners do an excellent job of holding the towel in place
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yoga mat towel after getting frustrated with my Manduka towel, which moved a lot during the practice. The IUGA towel's corners do an excellent job of holding the towel in place, with only minor bunching during my hot yoga class. The thickness of the towel is excellent as well, much thicker than the Manduka or the HealthYoga towel I purchased and returned last week (massive shrinking after drying even thought the package said "dryer safe"). I like the corner pocket design more than the full end flap of the HealthYoga mat as well. Great towel for anyone practicing Hot Yoga.
customer_reviews.author: LRez57

customer_reviews.title: Yoga and perfect curly hair towel!
customer_reviews.text: So funny story I bought my first set for hot yoga and it worked great. As long as you wet it down a little before hand it doesn't move much, soaks up sweat, it's great! I also noticed this towel was great for traveling, camping, it dries quickly and best of all when I started the curly girl method for my curly hair it was stellar at drying without messing up my curl pattern or making my hair frizzy! It worked so well I had to buy another set for my yoga practice! If they made a hair turban out of this exact material I'd be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: M Angelique Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know the name, had no expectations, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was worried about the quality of the sweat towel with the price, but it performs very well. Yoga towel is great, only one I have that really doesn’t require being wet for any grip. I use this for hot Pilates where we get stinky and wet, and this one outperforms every other towel I got for water absorption and drying, gripping during practice, and the material doesn’t rip up my elbows. I think I covered the topics that concerned me when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. I have so far picked up three of them. I’m doing hot yoga multiple times per week and didn’t want to wash my towel every day. This thing fits well on my mat and stays there the whole time, despite me being a larger guy. I’m also a sweater, and this thing does an amazing job absorbing all the sweat while still letting me get into positions without slipping. So far I’ve washed this a good number of times and it still is like new. Overall, I’m very happy I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Conway Stern

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I've been practicing Bikram hot yoga for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've been practicing Bikram hot yoga for the last ten or so years and have finally found the perfect fit for a towel over a mat. Not only does the towel fit my mat perfectly, it never slides! Never thought I'd find a towel that would work. Although the spray bottle is nice, you really don't need to spray the towel before your class starts. I'm going to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: maribe

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks and too rough. Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of a yoga towel is being able to wash it. With each washing, this towel has shrunk and gotten rougher (to the point that I'm getting "rugburn" on my toes). I always cold wash and hang to dry. Unfortunately I own two of these towels and both are past their return window. Buy the yogitoes towel instead!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: fit exactly over my mat with the corner pockets inserted. didn't pull out at all and excellent grip. My towel was soaked after first use and i never felt like i was laying in a puddle. it absorbed and distributed the water. probably gonna grab a second one so i don't have to rush clean it every time. face cloth is just a little coarse but i personally like it like that.
customer_reviews.author: Dino P

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit at all
customer_reviews.text: Washed this twice before using, as the enclosed instructions say to do. I didn’t even use the dryer for this and it either shrank badly or was never going to fit from the start. The length is fine but it’s extremely narrow and won’t fit any of my mats. Not even close. Inches off. I tried on six different mats in this house, thinking it might stretch a little and fit one of them. Not even close. It’s a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: P Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!! Measure your mat before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly in hot yoga. Quality is excellent!! No slipping at all. Something to note, I made a purchase error. I ordered a towel that was too short. My advice is measure your mat before you purchase. Lengthwise, it didn't cover my entire mat. Regardless, this is the perfect yoga towel for hot yoga. Best one I have ever had!!!! I plan to purchase more. You can never have too many yoga towels =)
customer_reviews.author: Nguest

customer_reviews.title: Good towel for hot yoga and yoga/HIIT combo classes
customer_reviews.text: I got this towel because I have a latex allergy and my mat was causing havoc on my feet. I was concerned about 'bunching' because I yoga/HIIT combo classics so there's lots of jumping. I can happily say that the towel stays put--I did spray the first few times but after a few washes (air dry only) it doesn't seem to need a mist of water anymore. I really love it for hot yoga--soaks up sweat and is soft and smooth. Very good deal too. This is something I am already recommending to fellow yogis.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home mommy

customer_reviews.title: Makes hot yoga less messy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a sweaty yogi so it was definitely time to invest in a yoga towel. Overall this is a great product. Quickly air dries after washing. Doesn't move much or bunch up during yoga sessions. Very absorbent. The only negative for this is that it doesn't fit my mat as snugly as I had hoped which makes rolling it up after class a bit of a hassle. Overall, I'll take that little negative for all the good things about this mat.
customer_reviews.author: CU

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product because it is the size of my mat and it fits perfectly by adjusting it from the edges. It is absorbent but the fabric is not soft at all, I think it is fine for the mat but I would like that the towel fabric is different, it also comes with a small bottle of spray bottle as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It works but didn’t fit my standard mat
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time in my hot yoga class. I used the spray bottle provided and gave the towel a light spray. Pro: I did not slip at all during my class. Cons: The towel is too big for my standard size mat so it bunches. I also will not use the small towel included as it's a little rough to use on my face to wipe off sweat. I brought my own soft towel in.
customer_reviews.author: Brinson W Crews

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was thinking, trying to do Power Yoga on a mat without a towel. My practice is 100x better with this towel, which I bought mostly because its the same brand as my mat. I love them both! It stays on my mat through the whole practice (I love the little pockets in the corners to slip on to the mat) and it folds up small enough to carry in a little bag to and from practice.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive towels. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT great$$$ I own 3 yoga towels and I take HOT yoga. I have been searching for a towel that stays in place. It has 4 Corners to tuck the mat into. I never had to adjust it once. Spray water lightly over towel before class and it stays down.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hot yoga aficionado. It did the job for me where I didn't slip and it wasn't heavy when it was soaked in my sweat. I appreciated the pockets so it could be extra secure on the yoga mat. I wish the hand towel was bigger just because I sweat like a pig during these hot yoga session. But the hand towel are standard size towels that you use at a boutique fitness studio.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: The best hot yoga towel I have used!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have struggled to find a hot yoga towel that I actually enjoy using. I have gone through several, which either move all over the place, don't have a good grip, or get too saturated in sweat. The studio I go to is 95F and 50% humidity and I am always dripping in sweat. The towel is perfect! The grip is great and it doesn't move. I plan on getting a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: Alethea C.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, minimal slipping and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this towel for Bikram and hot flow yoga and have been impressed each time. Less slippage and bunching when you mist lightly with water using the spray bottle provided, prior to practicing. I love the feature of the corner pockets as they spread out the towel over your entire mat. The hand towel provided is super absorbent and even works for a shower on the go. So far both have held up well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rania A Habib

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says- excellent towel mat.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I went with this one. Not only does it come with the spray bottle and extra small towel- but the actual towel mat is amazingly grippy. I just put it over my other mat and I’m able to get much deeper into my poses than ever before. I was going to go with a more expensive one that only came with the mat towel. I’m so happy with this decision - its great!
customer_reviews.author: Caliegh

customer_reviews.title: Great towel. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep from sliding on my mat. My hands and feet sweat during hatha vinyasa class making it hard to do some asanas without slipping. This towel fit my mat perfectly, only rumpled a tiny bit in the middle and kept me firmly grounded for the whole hour. Instructions say to spray the mat but didn't seem to need it so I used the little bottle for mat cleaner instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitfud

customer_reviews.title: HAD to spray it to have good grip, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to compare w YogaRat Gummy Grip Yoga Towels - Smooth Silicone Backing to use as Travel Yoga mat. The IUGA towel is really good, but I HAD to spray it to have good grip and that is not ideal for traveling. It is lighter wt. and more compact but I went with YogaRat. I would recommend it for regular studio yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: this works just fine. there is some bunching, but no sliding really because of the pockets. when i purchased there was no 68" option, which is the traditional mat length, so i had to get 72" and i tuck it under in the back. much better than other similarly priced options. not as good as a yogitoes or manduka towel - but good starter towel and good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LeighAnn Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great product! This is the second time I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is the second time I purchased this towel. I bought one for myself and loved it so I bought another for my GF. There is no need to spend over $20 for a hot yoga towel as long as these are around! I do have a different backup towel in case I don't get this one washed in time for my next class, it was a couple dollars cheaper but not even close to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Towel For Hot Yoga!
customer_reviews.text: This Name Brand Was Recommended To Me And Now I Recommend It to You. It’s Much Better Than The Previous Brands I’ve Owned. I Like That It Has These Flaps Where You Can Tuck The Ends Of your Mat Into For a More Secure Grip When You’re Having That Super Good Hot Yoga Class. I Also Enjoy The Smaller Towel That I Aide For My Hands For a Better Grip Or To Wipe My Face. You WON’T Be Disappointed. It’s a Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Heart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover-up for Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: This Yoga towel covers my standard mat perfectly. All 4 corners have pockets for the mat to fit into. I like that it takes away that sticky-feel when using the mat from bare feet or other body parts. I also love that it can be taken off and washed.
customer_reviews.author: Daisygirl

customer_reviews.title: The incredible immovable mat towel.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mat towel. It does not move at all during my hot yoga class and I don't even have to spray the corners. I accidentally dried the towel and it didn't shrink, which is good since it has the 4 corner pockets. Maybe I have a long mat, but the towel fit it perfectly. Some reviewers said it was too long though. I want to order another towel in a different color. Also the smaller towel is great, I think this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Casey

customer_reviews.title: No slip and fits my mat perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The mat towel is great because it has corner pockets that fit perfectly over my mat. The towel is quite large, so you will need a larger mat for it to fit snugly. It is also super absorbent! I love that this set comes with a hand towel and a spray bottle. I just give the towel a few sprays in the beginning of class where I know my hands and feet will mostly be, and it works great! I've used my sisters more expensive towel, which is a bit softer, but I much prefer this one. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Reilly Shoopman

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga towel for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this towel several times weekly for the past six weeks. It is very absorbent for use in hot yoga. It can bunch up every once in a while with certain position transitions and there has been a handful of times I had to readjust the towel while in class. The customer service with Iuga is amazing. I had an issue with only the spray bottle breaking and Iuga responded very generously with a new bottle and towel. Additionally, it is a very nice bonus that Iuga also adds the hand towel as part of the overall package. Could it be better, yes, but worth the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant, non-slippery (even without spraying first)
customer_reviews.text: Wow. The reviews were true. Super absorbant, non-slippery (even without spraying first), and a must-have for all exercises! It's especially helpful for hot yoga, when water and sweat are piled onto your mat. This towel absorbs the entire thing and dries quickly too. Love the little hand towel that comes with it. I purchased 2, and am now about to purchase a third. :) it was a little longer than my yoga mat, but tucking it underneath fixed it. I'd rather it be too big than too small right? :)
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hot yoga non-slip towel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this non-slip mat towel 5x for hot yoga now and it has worked great for me. I love the color. It’s a little bit longer than my mat, but the corner tabs do wonders to keep it in place! I never have to adjust it during class. Easy to wash. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Peters

customer_reviews.title: What a nice set!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set came quickly, was very reasonable priced and I LOVE the way it has the corners secured with ‘pockets’ that hook on the other side. Very nice addition so that the towel doesn’t move when you do! Didn’t notice that it came with a little spray bottle. That was a nice surprise! Love to spray my towel with some water before practice for extra moisture!
customer_reviews.author: Dina fehler

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, u bought one for myself and one for my friend , but my old one had anti slippery surface. Like little rubber bubbles. That is the only thing missing .
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: Namastay on your mat
customer_reviews.text: Love that is big enough for my manduka prolite. You can flip the dog to a warrior one to a warrior 2. I did not realize how much that distracted me. Heavy sweating, you don't need the water to make it stay
customer_reviews.author: NoreenEugene

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this this towel to use during hot yoga class. I washed it once after receiving it per the instructions. The towel is very soft and does not bunch or roll when I use it during class. I have an extra long yoga mat, so I can not use the corner holders on the towel. I would highly recommend this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great towel, no slip!
customer_reviews.text: After much contemplation I decided to get this towel set. I have used it once and love it. It fits perfectly on my yoga mat (even after washing and drying) and I didn't slip or slide during my hot yoga class. The smaller towel was perfect for wiping my face during class. I may order a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: lula5525

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to clean feels good
customer_reviews.text: There is bunching up in the middle. But overall that can not be expected to not happen during to the fact the towel is a towel. And there is nothing to stop this from happening in the middle of it.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE BULLON

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for so much received.
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoy this product and have used it during many of my yoga sessions. I love the little water bottle that I use to put alcohol in, to spritz my hands before and after class.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana G.

customer_reviews.title: SLIP AND SLIDE NO MORE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sweaty hands and feet (even when it's cold, for no reason) and this made yoga miserable. I tried gloves and socks with the nubbies, but those would just slip around and cut into the skin between my fingers and toes. I tried this towel once and was in love. I didn't even need to spray it with water (although that's recommended). I can stay firmly planted in downward dog for as long as I please! This is also a great option for yogis on a budget - I'd say it's worth three times what I paid for it. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga towel is great! The whole order was quite a deal! I found my mat was a little short for the towel, but the corner pockets make it easier to keep in place. The smaller towel is great for wiping hands or face when things get a little too hot. And the spray bottle is a great accessory to have for wetting the mat before class or cleaning it afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: The package comes with a small spritz bottle - fill it with water and spray the towel to gently wet it and prevent it from slipping. But be careful to only spray your hands and feet area; I sprayed the area I sit in and had a wet butt the rest of class 😩 It also comes with a small hand towel, which is convenient. My yoga mat is only 72”X24". Since the towel has a width of 26", it hangs off the side, but that does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: melissa chapman

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought the grey set a few months ago and I use these almost daily. After the 1st set arrived I had to order more. I love the pockets that fit over my mat perfectly and the matching had towel. Nice package for the cost and they have held up to my sometimes twice a day yoga habit :) Super convent to just throw in the washer when you done and have a fresh and clean mat every time!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Pocase

customer_reviews.title: No More Slip Sliding Away!
customer_reviews.text: This combo pack is not only a great value but perform as advertised. The added travel spray bottle makes this a perfect set. A few drops of essential oil in with the water adds to the experience. Super soft, absorbent and most important, they stay in place. I just ordered another so I always have a clean one ready to go. Purchased to use during hot yoga.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is the second iuga non slip towel set that I've purchased & I bought a second so I didn't have to do laundry every day. This towel set has been the perfect addition to my practice. Absorbent & soft it keeps my mat dry, plus the pockets keep it attached to my mat & from bunching up under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: S.Grunewaldt

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Really helps prevent slippage.

No slippage, and it actually seems to be grippier when it's damp, so sweat is no problem. I will probably buy another one to rotate them in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for hot yoga/hot power yoga!

customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT prevent slipping
customer_reviews.text: This towel has an unpleasant texture, and needs to be completely wet before it prevents slipping. A regular bath towel works better. I like the folded corners, which help it to stay on my yoga mat, but otherwise, this is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Luchadora

customer_reviews.title: The perfect towel buddies for your yoga mat!

customer_reviews.author: lisacat619

customer_reviews.title: This is a great towel and I love you can actually secure the ...

I've only used it once for hot yoga and am overall happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan2016

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel to do hot pilates. I love the towel. It fit my mat perfectly and although a few posts complained about it being slick, it is not. I did not even use the mister to make the towel damp before use. I have never slipped once. I will buy another one of these towels. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have started doing hot yoga and needed a cover. I read the reviews and was aware they could be an oder but that is not the case. I washed my items, hung them to dry and used them this week. The spray bottle is necessary so make sure to have it with you. I added some lavender oil to the water-delightful! customer_reviews.author: LizWalkerPHX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this towel repeatedly 3 to 4 classes a week for months. It is still my favorite towel and holding up perfectly. I will order another for sure.
customer_reviews.author: I and I Chi Gong

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS AMAZINGLY
customer_reviews.text: As a sweaty guy I tried lots of things - different mats, towels, rugs...etc. I even went and asked about CORK. Lucky for me I stopped into a high end studio that I didn't go to and the guy just gave me the real answer not the upsell answer - he said to try IUGA. I did, and now am sold. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Any Yogi
customer_reviews.text: This towel is incredible - it's totally changed my practice! I do hot yoga and was getting so frustrated with slipping and sliding all over my mat no matter how many towels I brought. This towel keeps me glued to the mat no matter what. It's machine washable and the corner flaps keep the towel perfectly situated on the mat. I can't believe I ever went without it. This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a good towel that my only complaint is that it is not wide enough to fit my manduka mat. So when I put it on the corners of the mat pull in
customer_reviews.author: janae nute

customer_reviews.title: Corner pockets a bit large but ok.
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger then a standard size yoga mat so pockets on corners will move a bit. Overall very satisfied with mat towel and washes/dries without any problems. The sweat towel was a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Newbie
customer_reviews.text: Though I am new to yoga, I purchased two of these towels with their accompanying small hand towels. Love them. The towels have corners which allow your mat to be inserted into them which keeps the towel from shifting around during the session. They absorb water so incredibly well and dry relatively quickly. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.Worth

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than standard yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: This towel has pockets to keep it on the mat which is a big reason I bought it, but it’s too big for my standard yoga mat...I’m still using it, but it doesn’t really stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hepner

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Solved the issue of slipping all over my yoga mat during hot flow yoga. It makes ALL the difference and is a game changer! Just getting through the class is tough enough without sliding all over your mat in your own sweat, gross! Get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My fave hot yoga towels. Bought one and kept washing it bc I liked it most out of my others. Just bought a second one and will probably buy another. Love it. Wish it was a little longer bc I have an extra long mat bc I’m 5’10”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Solid Yoga Towel Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of towels. Was worried they'd be too rough, but once wetted and class is underway they have a great grip. I wash them using my sport detergent after each class and I have yet to see any wear (10+ washings as of this writing). Would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Pleasently surpricsed by this budget towel.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great yoga towel. I like the weave and the edges seem like a good stitch. It doesn't have any gripping on the bottom but the corner pockets should keep it from sliding around. Plus you can always wet it a little. The extra face towel and wetting bottle make this a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Schneid

customer_reviews.title: No more bunching up after or during poses
customer_reviews.text: Great towel, super absorbent, soft. I use this in combination with the iuga pro non slip mat in my hot yoga sessions. The towel fits just right to grab the corners and lay flat with no bunching! Definitely recommend if you sweat a lot or don’t sweat a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the price and extra hand yoga towel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was expecting the towel to be a bit bigger. Of the 4 corner pocket sides I can only fit 3 of the corners on the yoga mat. I have a standard size yoga mat. The towel is thick as described
customer_reviews.author: Ess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent yoga towel! This towel is very grippy and does not slide around or bunch up very much. I love the four corner pockets! I highly recommend this yoga towel. The hand towel and spray bottle are great bonuses too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work with and very absorbent. The only drawback is that the size I ordered 68” x 24” is 2 to 4” short of fitting the corner pocket. I’m using it as a cover over my yoga mat for right now. It would be almost perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jkit

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, unfortunately it's so delicate it sticks to everything. Very hard to do yoga with this cheap fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha-Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this set. I love the corner pockets and mat towel is not slippery. So much better than a pricey big name towel I have, which is slippery and does not stay put. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SophiaL

customer_reviews.title: Great towel!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best yoga mat towel out there. The price is awesome too. I’ve had other towels that shrank and shriveled and had to throw away. Not this one
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Mason

customer_reviews.title: No sweat
customer_reviews.text: Great absorbency. The combination of towel and hand cloth together do a great job of keeping sweat off my practice. It’s soft enough and I gave 3 stars for “easy to clean” only because they recommend air drying, but it’s worth it if that’s what it takes to keep in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. I have an older mat which is a little bit larger than newer ones, and it fit perfect. Material is soft and absorbent. Recommended to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The towels are highly absorbent which is great for hot yoga. My mat is smaller than the mat towel which means I have to fold one end under the mat. I'm hoping that a toss in the dryer will fix that. Next time I'd measure the mat before buyinng.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So I tried a couple different types of towels to see what would work best. This one is my favorite for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m relatively new to hot yoga. So I tried a couple different types of towels to see what would work best. This one is my favorite for a few reasons. First of all it has a good grip to it so I don’t feel like I’m slipping on my mat. Some towels I really need to spray with a lot of water so I don’t feel like I’m slipping and I’m finding I don’t even need to with this one. It’s also a nice soft material-I don’t feel like I’m sticking to it. I like that it comes with a hand towel,that’s a nice feature, and best of all the price is really good for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Can't hot yoga without it.
customer_reviews.text: Highly absorbent - my mat is surprisingly dry beneath, even in the hottest classes. The pockets in the corners are helpful! The little face towel is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Z. M.

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as it promises. Zero slipping or sliding during my yoga sessions and the only creases are due to my mat being slightly shorter than the towel. Even then, they are few and far between when I roll it under the end of my mat. I tend to sweat pretty badly and was ready to give up yoga all together until I found this. Cannot rate it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best towel
customer_reviews.text: Tried yogitoes towel twice which was provided as a new yoga participant. They wanted $68 at the studio, and 48 on Amazon for one. So I tried this for 20 bucks and it had less bunching, less moving and absorbed more sweat than the yogitoes. Super amazing product and it's a bit thinner and not as sticky feeling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: The towel is helpful for hot yoga but a little bigger than the standard size (i.e. Gaia brand) yoga mat. So for some movement it bunches up. The seller was very helpful and helped me with a smaller towel. It came with a water bottle but no instructions but I figured out that the towel itself is slippery until it is a little moist where you put your hands and feet for Downward Facing Dog, so spraying some water before using is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: cressmanmusic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a sweaty yogi needs
customer_reviews.text: Great for a sweaty yogi like myself. Fits every yoga mat I've ever seen at any studio. Creates exactly the traction you need. Sure you have to readjust here and there throughout practice, but nothing annoying. Only caveat to the material is that I scraped my face wiping a little too aggressively with the hand towel between poses.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga towel
customer_reviews.text: Per request I ordered this for my daughter as a Christmas present. At first she didn’t think it would fit her yoga mat and she was afraid it would slip since there isn’t any non-slip backing on the towel. After trying it in her yoga class she was happy to report that neither of these things were a problem. It fit her mat and it didnt slip! So she’s happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Great price, worked like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Went to a really intense sculpt hot yoga class and didn’t have any kind of towel - ROOKIE MISTAKE - I was slippin and sliding all over the mat, couldn’t even hold a d-dog! so I immediately went home and purchased this online, it showed up in a few days and worked perfectly in my next class. The corner pockets fit perfectly over my mat and I like that it included a little spray bottle to spray your towel in the beginning of class so you have some grip. The little hand-sized towel was also an added bonus to wipe myself down! Awesome purchase for a great price, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cstein

customer_reviews.title: Great for bikram. Fit perfectly over my mat.
customer_reviews.text: These towels are fantastic.. They fit over our mats perfectly. The thickness, look and feel of the material is great. We have been using them for bikram yoga and they work just as we had hoped. Small towel bonus is soooo useful too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a great color (teal) and several pieces for yoga. Also appreciate how it came with a small plastic bottle for storing liquids.
customer_reviews.author: diablonecros

customer_reviews.title: Love that this comes with the extra little towel and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this comes with the extra little towel and dig the color. It has helped me slip less, however, it obviously needed a wash after a few uses since it was pretty drenched in sweat. I feel like it's less effective since it's been washed which bums me out. But, it works fine and keeps my mat from getting less abuse.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I used this yoga towel for a vinyasa hot yoga class. The corners of the mat tuck into the towel. Imagine not having your towel move all over the place. Following the instructions it is a good idea to wet the area for your hands and feet for better traction. Once you do this there is no slipping. All in all looking for a reason to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: heritage b

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I do hot yoga and I couldn't find a mat that handled sweat well. I would slip and slide all over the place. I was so frustrated until I found this towel mat. I'm able to stay in my poses regardless of how soaked my hands and feet are. It fits my yoga mat perfectly and doesn't move around. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to be able to tuck the corners of my mat into this towel as advertised but my LuLu Lemon Mat does not fit. I do still tend to slip on this mat so I mainly use it to keep my mat clean from dirty floors when I roll it up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bikram Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month for a 30 day Bikram Yoga Challenge and love it! Excellent purchase! I wash/dry it every other day and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: IRoomba

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase you will ever make.
customer_reviews.text: Best yoga mat towel I've ever used! It's amazing in hot yoga classes. It absorbs all the sweat and my hands don't slip in downward dog (which I have previously struggled with using many different towels). It's super easy to clean and looks straight out of the package afterwards. I will never use another mat towel again. This is a forever purchase that I will continue to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a fantastic set! The large towel worth corner pockets is ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic set! The large towel worth corner pockets is perfect for Bikram and HotWorx sessions. The small towel is the perfect face accompaniment. So pleased and continued to be impressed after multiple washes. Great product! Ordered multiple and plan on ordering more,
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for hot yoga. Not a perfect fit but close enough. I fold the extra towel under my yoga mat. I do have a problem with the towel wrinkling which is bothersome at times. For the most part it is super absorbent. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Mist

customer_reviews.title: Non slippery and very absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: Ive usted this May for two weeks and so far I love it! I can do yoga without slip my feet and it absorbs all the sweat very good! I recommend it. But don’t forget to wash it twice before use it. It really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah
